main.name: Eeshwar P
main.description: Highly motivated software engineering professional with experience in developing, deploying, and maintaining web, mobile, and desktop applications.
main.bio: Seasoned professional with approximately 2 years of hands-on experience in the development, testing, and maintenance of web applications in Client/Server environments. Proficient in UI technology stacks, showcasing expertise in frameworks such as JavaScript, Node.js, Express, ReactJS, and REST API's. Skilled in developing web applications using HTML, CSS, Tailwind, JavaScript, and Typescript. Well-versed in version controlling/tracking systems like GIT and Jenkins. Experience in cloud platforms like AWS, Azure. Certified AWS Cloud Practitioner.

education.degree: Master's of Science in Computer Science

education.school: Vignan Institute of Technology and Science
education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Systems Engineer
description: My role along with my team was to re-design the UI experience of an application from legacy application to brand new SPA using React JS and Redux.
The legacy codebase consisted of 10,000 lines of code, and we reduced it by 30% by optimizing the code.
Worked with Express.js for development of RESTful web services and middleware configurations.
Developed various reusable components and pages for the application as per business requirements.
Building User centered design components by using Kendo-React library Data grids, Input fields, Dropdowns, Dialogs.
Implemented Single Sign-On (SSO) authentication for internal customers using IAM OAuth based and SAML authentication for external customers.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Streamlined and developed web application functionality by identifying and rectifying bugs in the UI codebase.
Optimized the website speed and performance.
Developed RESTful APIs using Flask and Ruby on Rails, handling authentication, data processing, and integration with various third-party services reducing API response times by 20%.
Executed technical optimizations, integrating Redis caching for database performance enhancement, reducing response times by 30%, and improving system responsiveness.
Architected a real-time analytics dashboard, leveraging WebSockets and D3.js, providing clients with actionable insights, resulting in a 25% increase in user engagement.
